title: Ayuso Implodes, Del Toro Fights to Save UAE’s Giro d’Italia
content:
UAE's near-perfect Giro in danger of unraveling as Ayuso cracks and Carapaz closes in on Del Toro: 'I hope to have better legs tomorrow.'

Read the full article at Ayuso Implodes, Del Toro Fights to Save UAE’s Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
